Application Command.Description: guild id of the command, if not global

Application Command.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
Application Command.Description: Localization dictionary for name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
Description for CHAT_INPUT commands, 1-100 characters. Empty string for USER and MESSAGE commands

Application Command.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
Application Command.Description: Localization dictionary for description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description
Parameters for the command, max of 25
Set of permissions represented as a bit set
Indicates whether the command is available in DMs with the app, only for globally-scoped commands. By default, commands are visible.
Not recommended for use as field will soon be deprecated. Indicates whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild, defaults to true
Autoincrementing version identifier updated during substantial record changes

Application Command Option.Type: one of application command option type
dictionary with keys in available locales
Application Command Option.Description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name

Application Command Option.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
Application Command Option.Description: Localization dictionary for the description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description
If the parameter is required or optional--default false

Application Command Option.Type: array of application command option choice
Application Command Option.Description: Choices for STRING, INTEGER, and NUMBER types for the user to pick from, max 25
If the option is a subcommand or subcommand group type, these nested options will be the parameters
If the option is a channel type, the channels shown will be restricted to these types

Application Command Option.Type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options
Application Command Option.Description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the minimum value permitted

Application Command Option.Type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options
Application Command Option.Description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the maximum value permitted
For option type STRING, the minimum allowed length (minimum of 0, maximum of 6000)
For option type STRING, the maximum allowed length (minimum of 1, maximum of 6000)
If autocomplete interactions are enabled for this STRING, INTEGER, or NUMBER type option

Application Command Option Choice.Type: dictionary with keys in available locales
Application Command Option Choice.Description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
Value for the choice, up to 100 characters if string

Application Command Interaction Data Opt.Description: Value of application command option type
Value of the option resulting from user input

Application Command Interaction Data Opt.Type: array of application command interaction data option
Application Command Interaction Data Opt.Description: Present if this option is a group or subcommand
true if this option is the currently focused option for autocomplete

Guild Application Command Permissions.Description: ID of the command or the application ID
ID of the application the command belongs to
Permissions for the command in the guild, max of 100

Application Command Permissions.Description: ID of the role, user, or channel. It can also be a permission constant
true to allow, false, to disallow
